text: Javier Hernández Balcázar (born June 1, 1988 in Guadalajara, Mexico), also known as Chicharito, is a Mexican footballer. He plays for the American club, LA Galaxy and the Mexican national team. ==Biography== Hernández was born in 1988 in Guadalajara, Mexico.
